divs: Sighting Detailsthis is not much of a sighting compared to others,but I was taking my two dogs out for there last well what dogs do in the yard at 11:52pm and as soon as I stepped on the runway part of my deck I saw the white round light .not sure of the size but big enough.maybe as big as a compact car? so as usual when i have seen one ,I will shine my four d battery mag light at it and start messing with them,most of the time they will do something ive seen them like power down,its like turning a coleman lantern down real fast you can still see the craft,I used to think all this was cool until last fall!!!! anyway he was over an old strip mine and when I started putting my light and the laser from my glock almost instantly a smaller red one came from out of the north ,and just stayed in one place ,like checking me out the white one kept looking around and went over out of my sight.my dogs wer finished and with the red one still about500 feet over the mountain ,I just came on in my house!I've seen round ones one shaped like a thumbnail and I had a very very close up encounter with one that was shaped like arectangle jewel!!! u can laugh or think I am a nutcase!!when it happens to you see how hard you laugh then !!!! they are here don't kidd yourself and pretend they aren't.i could type a 2500 word essay but it wont do any good I have called mufon before about 3 yrs ago and never recieved a call back , I thought I would reach out one more time!!! the ball is in your court!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Summary: this is just the latest unmistakable sighting ! there were two one white and one red round shaped this time . no I am not crazy even though it makes you feel like it at times ! in the last 3 years my family and I have had numerous sightings!call me!!!!!!!
trends: There has been one other sighting in McDowell
There were no other sightings in McDowell on or around April 7th 2013
